attributes.action: Take action against the inhumanity of Uyghur Muslims in China
attributes.additional_details: Because there are millions of Muslims held in concentration camps for no blatant reason and the fact that no one is doing anything and it is not getting any media coverage is outrageous as millions of lives have been lost already
attributes.background: Talk about this situation and decide on what they can do to help those Muslims affected and potentially save millions of lives
